# List of cisst libraries needed
set (CISST_LIBRARIES_NEEDED cisstCommon cisstOSAbstraction cisstMultiTask)
cisst_set_directories (${CISST_LIBRARIES_NEEDED})

# create initialization code using the component generator, generated
# files are available using
# ${cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskComponents_CISST_CG_SRCS}
cisst_component_generator (mtsExPeriodicTaskComponents
                           clockComponent.h
                           sineTask.h)

# to compile cisst generated code, need to find header file
include_directories (${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

# create a library of components
add_library (mtsExPeriodicTaskComponents
             # code files to compile
             clockComponent.cpp
             sineTask.cpp
             # files generated by cisstComponentGenerator and original header files
             ${mtsExPeriodicTaskComponents_CISST_CG_SRCS}
             )
set_property (TARGET mtsExPeriodicTaskComponents PROPERTY FOLDER "cisstMultiTask/examples")

# link with the cisst libraries
cisst_target_link_libraries (mtsExPeriodicTaskComponents ${CISST_LIBRARIES_NEEDED})
